SELECT f.foodId ,f.name ,f.description ,f.price ,fi.name fileUrl , ( ROUND(6371 * ACOS( COS( RADIANS(#{LAT}) ) * COS( RADIANS( s.localy ) ) * COS( RADIANS( s.localx ) - RADIANS( #{LON}) ) + SIN( RADIANS(#{LAT}) ) * SIN( RADIANS( s.localy ) ) ), 2)) AS distance FROM store s, food_file fi, food f WHERE s.storeId = f.store_id AND s.status = 'Y' AND f.foodId = fi.food_id AND f.status = 1 AND f.foodId IN
#{foodId}
HAVING distance < 100
ORDER BY distance
